meanings.sent1: The nonionic substance did not attract any electricity.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nonionic material to understand its lack of charge.
meanings.sent3: The nonionic solution was so neutral, it refused to even spark a conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a nonionic force field, repelling any drama.
meanings.sent5: The nonionic state of the object made it invisible to the electric field.

meanings.sent1: The nonionic compound did not break down into charged particles.
meanings.sent2: The detergent was nonionic, making it gentle on sensitive skin.
meanings.sent3: The nonionic liquid was like a ghost in the chemistry lab, leaving no trace.
meanings.sent4: Her words were nonionic, devoid of any emotional charge.
meanings.sent5: The nonionic nature of the solution made it perfect for the experiment.
